item.title: I-225 South Approaching I-25
item.description: I-225 South approaching Exit 1A - I-25 South/Colorado Springs, and Exit 1B - I-25 north/Denver. This is the southern end of I-225.

item.title: I-70 West/I-225 South Separation - Aurora
item.description: I-70 West/I-225 South Separation in Aurora. Merge left for (I-70) Exit 282 - I-225 South/Aurora/Colorado Springs. Merge right for ramp for I-70 west to Denver. Use far right lane for Peoria St.

item.title: I-70 West/I-225 South Split
item.description: I-70 West/I-225 South Split in Aurora, Colorado.

item.title: I-70 West - Exit 282
item.description: I-70 west at Exit 282 - I-225 South/Aurora/Colorado Springs.

item.title: I-70 West - Exits 283 and 282
item.description: I-70 west approaching Exit 283 - Chambers Road. Approaching Exit 282 - I-225 South/Colorado Springs.
